content.description: Source: based on information in Richard White, Railroaded: The Transcontinentals and the Making of Modern America (2011).
content.question: Which of the following helps to explain the development of railroad transportation as depicted in the graph?

choices.label: Growth of support from farmers for the business practices of railroads
Forced relocation of American Indians to work as railroad laborers
Distribution of federal government subsidies to railroad corporations
Increase of competition between different railroad companies

content.answer: Distribution of federal government subsidies to railroad corporations

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
